name: places/ChIJlThoM1BYwokRNUL7ZMMlWeM
formattedAddress: 521 W 48th St #1b, New York, NY 10036, USA
adrFormatAddress: 521 W 48th St #1b, New York, NY 10036-1123, USA

originalText.text:
Real estate in New York City is notoriously stressful when it comes to finding a place, especially if you're moving to the City for the first time. Property Link Management is unique. More specifically, Jennifer Suarez in the leasing office—She is incredibly thorough, extremely kind, and was pleasant to work with throughout the entire process. The company accommodates for short-term and long-term stays. The application and approval process was easy, and they didn't request an egregious amount of documentation.

On move in day, the apartment was clean and well decorated (my unit was furnished). So far, I've had two (small) issues that required me to file a maintenance request. For both issues, management responded immediately, and the issues were remedied within two days. The super is kind and puts packages in front of your door. The laundry in the building is very fair compared to other places I've seen—$1.25.

To anyone looking to move, I highly recommend any of Property Link's properties!

originalText.text:
I stayed at 521 W48 th for about 2 months.
The location is very convenient , you find everything around this neighborhood .
The apartment was clean and the customer service was very responsive.
The rooftop is amazing .The employees Abby and Amanda were very helpful and friendly as well as the maids.
I recommend this management and I would gladly return in my next visit to NYC.

originalText.text: I am staying at a property on Mulberry and so far it has been excellent. The building feels new (maybe recently gut renovated?), and the location cannot be beat! I am close to all major subway lines and there are a lot of great places to shop and eat around here. The check-in process was smooth and the unit feels like home.

text.text: I am staying at a property on Mulberry and so far it has been excellent. The building feels new (maybe recently gut renovated?), and the location cannot be beat! I am close to all major subway lines and there are a lot of great places to shop and eat around here. The check-in process was smooth and the unit feels like home.

originalText.text: I stayed here for 3 months (145 Mulberry) and absolutely loved it! The apartment looks exactly like it does in pictures! Very spacious for a studio as well. I was amazed how quiet this unit was considering its in the heart of Little Italy. Not to mention Nolita, SOHO, LES, TriBeCa and Chinatown are all minutes away. You can’t beat this location. Quick responses from management as well if I needed anything.

originalText.text: I stayed with this company when I moved to the city. I did not want to search for a "permanent apartment" before I was actually in NYC, so I stayed in a furnished unit for a few months while apartment shopping. I dealt with Jeniffer and Michelle, who were very helpful during my entire stay. I would recommend to a friend and I would stay with the company again if I ever needed to.
